get.summary: Action for checking if user already authenticated.

get.summary: Alias action for getting connections of currently authenticated user.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Optional parameter to filter connections by type.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: null means collection is loading from start, else - loading after offset

get.summary: Action for getting connections of someone with specified id (or alias if set) and type.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Optional parameter to filter connections by type.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: null means collection is loading from start, else - loading after offset

get.summary: Action for checking if current user has connections with someone with specified id (or alias if set) and type.

put.summary: Action for accepting and editing connection with someone.
put.description: Returns result of accepting/editing with errors if needed.

parameters.name: stateAction
parameters.description: State wanted to set for this connection.

post.summary: Action for creating new connection with someone.
post.description: Returns result of creation with errors if needed.

delete.summary: Action for deleting connection with someone.
delete.description: Returns result of deleting with errors if needed.

get.summary: Action for retrieving current user's feed including content from subscriptions.

parameters.description: null means collection is loading from start, else - loading after offset

get.summary: Action for retrieving feed from owner that is specified by id.

parameters.description: null means collection is loading from start, else - loading after offset

post.summary: Action for creating post in feed of owner that is specified by id.

get.summary: Action for retrieving post(if offset is null) and comments specified by owner id and post id.

parameters.description: null means collection is loading from start, else - loading after offset

post.summary: Action for creating comment to post specified by owner id and post id.

delete.summary: Action for deleting post in feed of owner that is specified by id.

parameters.description: null means collection is loading from start, else - loading after offset

IsSuccessful.description: True if succeeds, false if not.

Id.description: User's id if authentication is successful, Null if not.

RegistrationStep.description: Registration step where user have to be. Null if login failed.

IsSuccessful.description: True if succeeds, false if not.

ChangePasswordResult.description: Wrapper model for result of changing user's password.

IsSuccessful.description: True if succeeds, false if not.

SettingsModel.description: Model for viewing and editing user settings.

IsSearchingForJob.description: True if user is searching a job, false if not.

IsOfferingJob.description: True if user offers a job, false if not.

IsOfferingBusiness.description: True if user offers a business, false if not.

IsNotificationSoundOn.description: True if user wants to hear sound when gets notifications, false if not.

IsIpGeolocationOn.description: True if user wants to use location by IP, false if not.

IsPhoneNumberShown.description: True if shown, false if hidden.

IsEmailShown.description: True if shown, false if hidden.

Id.description: Id or alias(if set) of company. Null if company isn't exist yet.

Country.description: Country (for now is only string, but will be changed to country id(integer) later).

City.description: City (for now is only string, but will be changed to city id(integer) later).

Facebook.description: Link to the company's facebook account.

Vkontakte.description: Link to the company's vkontakte account.

Twitter.description: Link to the company's twitter account.

GooglePlus.description: Link to the company's g+ account.

Site.description: Link to the website of company.

Id.description: Id (or alias if set) of created/edited company.

IsSuccessful.description: True if succeeds, false if not.

CreateCompanyModel.description: Model that describes company for creation process.

Id.description: Id or alias(if set) of company. Null if company isn't exist yet.

Country.description: Country (for now is only string, but will be changed to country id(integer) later).

City.description: City (for now is only string, but will be changed to city id(integer) later).

Site.description: Link to the website of company.

ConnectionsModel.description: Wrapper model for part of connections collection.

Entities.description: Array that describes part of the collection. It always ordered by index even if there is no such field (it could be redundant).

HasAscendingOrder.description: True if Entities is ordered ascending, false if descending.

IsFirst.description: True if this is the first part, and no previous parts are available, false if not.

IsLast.description: True if this is the last part, and no further parts are available, false if not.

CollectionCount.description: Count of elements in whole collection.

ConnectionModel.description: Model that describes connection and it's state.

Id.description: Id or alias(if set) of owner.

LastActivityTime.description: Date and time of last activity. If less then 15 minutes ago then online, otherwise - offline.

DefaultType.description: Default type of owner. Needed to properly select further actions(HTML template, FE controller, etc.).

Types.description: All types assigned to this id or alias(if set).

ConnectionsCount.description: Count of connections of this owner.

IsOwnedByCurrentUser.description: True if currently authenticated user has permissions to manage this owner, false if not.

IsSuccessful.description: True if succeeds, false if not.

FeedModel.description: Wrapper model for part of posts collection. May be will include some additional fields.

Entities.description: Array that describes part of the collection. It always ordered by index even if there is no such field (it could be redundant).

HasAscendingOrder.description: True if Entities is ordered ascending, false if descending.

IsFirst.description: True if this is the first part, and no previous parts are available, false if not.

IsLast.description: True if this is the last part, and no further parts are available, false if not.

CollectionCount.description: Count of elements in whole collection.

PostModel.description: Model for post, also contains all fields needed for comments loading by parts.

Id.description: Id of post in Author's feed.

Content.description: Actual content of post. Only this field required for creating or editing post.

Date.description: Date and time when post was created. Can be null only when creating or editing post.

Repost.description: If not null contains reposted post without comments.

Likes.description: Likes of this post (also includes likes from repost of this post but excludes likes of original post if this is repost).

Reposts.description: Reposts of this post (also includes reposts from repost of this post but excludes reposts of original post if this is repost).

Entities.description: Array that describes part of the collection. It always ordered by index even if there is no such field (it could be redundant).

HasAscendingOrder.description: True if Entities is ordered ascending, false if descending.

IsFirst.description: True if this is the first part, and no previous parts are available, false if not.

IsLast.description: True if this is the last part, and no further parts are available, false if not.

CollectionCount.description: Count of elements in whole collection.

FullOwnerModel.description: Model that describes owner and all info about it.

Id.description: Id or alias(if set) of owner.

LastActivityTime.description: Date and time of last activity. If less then 15 minutes ago then online, otherwise - offline.

DefaultType.description: Default type of owner. Needed to properly select further actions(HTML template, FE controller, etc.).

Types.description: All types assigned to this id or alias(if set).

ConnectionsCount.description: Count of connections of this owner.

IsOwnedByCurrentUser.description: True if currently authenticated user has permissions to manage this owner, false if not.

LikesModel.description: Wrapper model for part of likes collection.

Entities.description: Array that describes part of the collection. It always ordered by index even if there is no such field (it could be redundant).

HasAscendingOrder.description: True if Entities is ordered ascending, false if descending.

IsFirst.description: True if this is the first part, and no previous parts are available, false if not.

IsLast.description: True if this is the last part, and no further parts are available, false if not.

CollectionCount.description: Count of elements in whole collection.

Content.description: Actual content of comment. Only this field required for creating or editing comment.

Date.description: Date and time when post was created. Can be null only when creating or editing post.

IsSuccessful.description: True if succeeds, false if not.

ManageCommentResult.description: Wrapper model for comment creation/edit/delete result.

IsSuccessful.description: True if succeeds, false if not.
True if succeeds, false if not.

Entities.description: Array that describes part of the collection. It always ordered by index even if there is no such field (it could be redundant).

Ids.description: Array of file ids to delete.

IsPublic.description: True if group is public, false if private.

Facebook.description: Link to the group's facebook account.

Twitter.description: Link to the group's twitter account.

GooglePlus.description: Link to the group's g+ account.

Site.description: Link to the website of group.

Id.description: Id (or alias if set) of group.

IsSuccessful.description: True if succeeds, false if not.

DialoguesModel.description: Wrapper model for part of dialogues collection. May be will include some additional fields.

UnreadCount.description: Count of dialogues that has at least one unread message.

Entities.description: Array that describes part of the collection. It always ordered by index even if there is no such field (it could be redundant).

HasAscendingOrder.description: True if Entities is ordered ascending, false if descending.

IsFirst.description: True if this is the first part, and no previous parts are available, false if not.

CollectionCount.description: Count of elements in whole collection.

DialogueModel.description: Model that describes dialogue and messages in it.

LastReadTime.description: Last time when current owner read this dialogue.

Entities.description: Array that describes part of the collection. It always ordered by index even if there is no such field (it could be redundant).

HasAscendingOrder.description: True if Entities is ordered ascending, false if descending.

IsFirst.description: True if this is the first part, and no previous parts are available, false if not.

IsLast.description: True if this is the last part, and no further parts are available, false if not.

MembersModel.description: Wrapper model for part of owners collection.

Entities.description: Array that describes part of the collection. It always ordered by index even if there is no such field (it could be redundant).

HasAscendingOrder.description: True if Entities is ordered ascending, false if descending.

IsFirst.description: True if this is the first part, and no previous parts are available, false if not.

IsLast.description: True if this is the last part, and no further parts are available, false if not.

CollectionCount.description: Count of elements in whole collection.

Content.description: Message content. May be will contain JSON object if it is system message.

IsSystem.description: True if it is system message (like adding new member, renaming, etc.), false if not.

OwnerModel.description: Model that describes owner who acts or to which action is applied.

Id.description: Id or alias(if set) of owner.

Name.description: Name for dialogue. If empty name will be created from members' names.

DialogueManageResult.description: Model that describes result of managing the dialogue (create, edit, delete).

IsSuccessful.description: True if succeeds, false if not.

Name.description: New name for dialogue. If empty name will be created from members' names.

MembersToAdd.description: Array of members' id's that should be added to dialogue.

Content.description: Actual content of page with html markup.

ResponsesModel.description: Wrapper model for part of responses collection.

Entities.description: Array that describes part of the collection. It always ordered by index even if there is no such field (it could be redundant).

HasAscendingOrder.description: True if Entities is ordered ascending, false if descending.

IsFirst.description: True if this is the first part, and no previous parts are available, false if not.

IsLast.description: True if this is the last part, and no further parts are available, false if not.

CollectionCount.description: Count of elements in whole collection.

Owner.description: Owner that have created this response.

Date.description: Date and time of creating response.

Comment.description: Additional comment for response to vacancy.

IsSuccessful.description: True if succeeds, false if not.

Connections.description: Result for search in connections. Exists only if Type == Connections.

Messages.description: Result for search in messages. Not implemented yet.

VacanciesModel.description: Wrapper model for part of vacancies collection.

Entities.description: Array that describes part of the collection. It always ordered by index even if there is no such field (it could be redundant).

HasAscendingOrder.description: True if Entities is ordered ascending, false if descending.

IsFirst.description: True if this is the first part, and no previous parts are available, false if not.

IsLast.description: True if this is the last part, and no further parts are available, false if not.

CollectionCount.description: Count of elements in whole collection.

Date.description: Date and time when this vacancy was created.

SkillModel.description: Model for describing user's skills. In future probably will contain more information.

IsEmailShown.description: True if shown, false if hidden.

IsMale.description: True if man, false if woman.

Country.description: Country (for now is only string, but will be changed to country id(integer) later).

City.description: City (for now is only string, but will be changed to city id(integer) later).

IsAgreed.description: True if agreed, false if not.

IsSuccessful.description: True if succeeds, false if not.

IsMale.description: True if man, false if woman.

Country.description: Country (for now is only string, but will be changed to country id(integer) later).

City.description: City (for now is only string, but will be changed to city id(integer) later).

About.description: Some text that user wants to say about him/her.

Description.description: Some text that user wants to say about what he/she do.

Facebook.description: Link to the user's facebook account.

Vkontakte.description: Link to the user's vkontakte account.

ExperienceModel.description: Model that describes user's work experience.

Company.description: Company (for now is only name, but will be changed to company id later and added company profile).

Country.description: Country (for now is only string, but will be changed to country id(integer) later).

City.description: City (for now is only string, but will be changed to city id(integer) later).

IsCurrent.description: True if user works currently on this position in this company, false if not.

StartDate.description: Date of start working on this position.

EndDate.description: Date of end working on this position. Null if IsCurrent == true.

Description.description: Description of or opinion about this position from user.

Organization.description: Organization name (for now is only string, but will be changed to education organization id later and added organization profile).

Degree.description: Name of degree (probably will be changed in future).

Country.description: Country (for now is only string, but will be changed to country id(integer) later).

City.description: City (for now is only string, but will be changed to city id(integer) later).

IsCurrent.description: True if user currently gets this education, false if not.

StartDate.description: Date of start getting this education.

EndDate.description: Date of end getting this education. Null if IsCurrent == true.

Description.description: Description of or opinion about this education from user.

IsSuccessful.description: True if succeeds, false if not.

Email.description: Email. Will be empty if owner's policy restricts it.

IsMale.description: True if man, false if woman.

IsBirthdayYearShown.description: True if owner's policy is allows it, false if not (in this case year in Birthday field won't be correct).

Birthday.description: Date of birth in ISO 8601 (e.g. 2014-02-15T00:00:00Z). Null if it shouldn't be shown for current user.

Country.description: Country (for now is only string, but will be changed to country id(integer) later).

City.description: City (for now is only string, but will be changed to city id(integer) later).

About.description: Some text that user wants to say about him/her.

Description.description: Some text that user wants to say about what he/she do.

Facebook.description: Link to the user's facebook account.

Vkontakte.description: Link to the user's vkontakte account.

Twitter.description: Link to the user's twitter account.

GooglePlus.description: Link to the user's g+ account.

Phone.description: User's phone number. Will be empty if owner's policy restricts it.

Experience.description: Array of objects that describes user's work experience.

Education.description: Array of objects that describes user's education.

IsSuccessful.description: True if succeeds, false if not.
